attributes.additional_details:
Our government are protecting certain groups  from cuts in disability benefits PERSONAL INDEPENDENCE PAYMENT AND INCAPACITY BENEFIT

But if you are aged between 16 years and 65 years , We feel these people are not being treated fairly .
There are people in our society who have been severely injured/seriously disabled and endured life changing injuries/disabilitys through no fault of their own and  for some reason are having to endure the distress of having to re live the trauma of previous events so these can be cataloged  and noted which is disgraceful . Our government already have all or access to this personal  information via DWP and NHS . So why are they making people who have been through so much trauma endure so much pain going for further medical assessments which are not necessary unless their is a change of circumstances
